invention-title: Lithium iron phosphate material synthesized by phosphorus-accumulating bacteria as well as preparation method and application of lithium iron phosphate material
一种聚磷菌合成磷酸铁锂材料及其制备方法和应用

abstract.p: The invention belongs to the technical field of resource recovery electrochemistry, and particularly discloses a lithium iron phosphate material synthesized by phosphorus-accumulating bacteria as well as a preparation method and application of the lithium iron phosphate material. The preparation method comprises the following steps: S1, inoculating an LB liquid culture medium with phosphorus-accumulating bacteria with a phosphorus removal effect of 10-20 mg/L, and culturing for 10-12 hours in a shaking table under the conditions that the temperature is 25 DEG C and the speed is 120 r/min; s2, adding lithium hydrogen phosphate into the culture solution, and continuously culturing for 22-26 hours; s3, adding ferrous sulfate into the culture solution, and continuously culturing for 24-36 hours; s4, adding lithium chloride into the culture solution, and continuously culturing for 22-26 hours; and S5, centrifuging to remove the culture solution, drying the sample, and annealing at 750-850 DEG C for 3-5 hours in a nitrogen atmosphere. A lithium iron phosphate material synthesized by phosphorus-accumulating bacteria and activated carbon are prepared into double electrodes, and lithium chloride in a water body is recovered based on a Faraday capacitor and a double-electrode-layer capacitor by utilizing a hybrid capacitive deionization technology, so that high-efficiency, high-adsorption-capacity, low-cost, low-energy-consumption and pollution-free recovery of lithium can be realized, and the lithium can be recycled.

本发明属于资源回收电化学技术领域，具体公开了一种聚磷菌合成磷酸铁锂材料及其制备方法和应用。所述制备方法包括以下步骤：S1.将除磷效果在10～20mg/L的聚磷菌接种至LB液体培养基，在摇床中于25℃，120r/min条件下培养10～12h；S2.向培养液中加入磷酸氢锂，继续培养22～26h；S3.向培养液中加入硫酸亚铁，继续培养24～36h；S4.向培养液中加入氯化锂，继续培养22～26h；S5.离心除去培养液后烘干样品，然后在氮气氛围下，750～850℃退火3～5h。将聚磷菌合成磷酸铁锂材料和活性炭制成双电极，利用杂化电容去离子技术，基于法拉第电容及双电层电容回收水体中的氯化锂，能够实现锂的高效、高吸附量、低成本、低能耗、无污染回收，并且能够进行循环再生利用。
